user.name: Emad
user.description: Open source generative AI. Building the Intelligent Internet @ii_posts. Founder @StabilityAI.

fullText:
Crypto once promised liberation; now it props up the powerful.

Capital over labour.

A friend was talking about the time she worked as a supervisor in a factory, and the strange experience she once had of arguing with someone so stupid that she couldn't explain to him why he was wrong. I asked if she used Twitter. She said no.

I rewrote the troublesome final paragraph of my current essay in my head as I was lying in bed this morning. It wasn't a case of "it came to me in a dream," but I wasn't entirely awake either. I often do this, but rarely more than a paragraph.
